about_the_game:
A refreshing fantasy RPG PvPvE action filled adventure! Delve solo or band with friends to challenge mythical islands filled with majestic treasures and treacherous monsters or you may like to take a step back, relax, build your own island and farm your lands to your hearts content!

EXPLORE ENDLESS ISLANDS

Explore procedurally generated islands with differing biomes, inhabitants and experiences!

CHALLENGING COMBAT

Battle a wide range of unique animals, monsters and bosses!

DEVELOP YOUR OWN ISLAND

If you enjoy a war-less experience, you can take a break and relax on your own personal island building up your home from the ground up or farming the land!

BATTLE AGAINST OR ALONGSIDE OTHERS

Join friends or enemies to challenge islands together or against eachother!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600, 3.3 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X, 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti, 2 GB or AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum System Requirements might change in the future
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11600K, 3.9 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 5600X, 3.7 GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070, 8 GB or AMD Radeon RX 590, 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
